column4: guys im trying to resize  a partition using gparted: but it shows a warning yellow triangle saying the partition contains some bad sectors... it suggests to use chkdsk on windows.. i did it and this scan didnt found any problem or damaged cluster
gparted continues to say the partitions have ones
if it's a ntfs partition, sometimes defragging will help get rid of the warnings ..I'll probly be corrected for this suggestion , but I have to say that it worked for me.
